headline.main: NAZI TANK LOSSES BELIEVED SERIOUS; Russians Report 10 Armored Divisions 'Destroyed, Badly Mauled or Disorganized'

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 2 (U.P.) -- Military observers here believed tonight that a slight advantage had passed to the Red Army after six weeks of war, and information received in Russian quarters said that ten German armored divisions, numbering approximately 110,000 men, 4,500 tanks and 30,000 other vehicles, had been "destroyed, badly mauled or disorganized" on the Eastern front thus far.
